Game.Title: Destiny 2
Game.Description:
Dive into the free-to-play world of Destiny 2 to experience responsive first-person shooter combat, explore the mysteries of our solar system, and unleash elemental abilities against powerful enemies. Download today to create your Guardian and collect unique weapons, armor, and gear to customize your look and playstyle. Experience Destiny 2’s cinematic story alone or with friends, join other Guardians for challenging co-op missions, or compete against them in a variety of PvP modes. You decide your legend.
Features: • An Immersive Story o Defend the Last City of humanity against the dark forces beyond our system • Guardian Classes o Choose from the armored Titan, mystic Warlock, or swift Hunter • Cooperative and Competitive Multiplayer o Play with or against your friends and other Guardians in various PvE and PvP game modes • Exotic Weapons and Armor o Collect an amazing array of weapons and armor to personalize your combat style
In-game purchases optional
